identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a top 1% luxury e-commerce experience for Fleur Fragrances using glassmorphism, advanced motion, and premium aesthetics.

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, product names.

rules: Never use solid backgrounds for floating elements (modals, cards, nav).
Always add a 1px semi-transparent border to define edges.
Use 'backdrop-saturate-150' to make colors behind the glass pop.

layout.spacing: Use 2x standard Tailwind spacing (e.g., p-8 instead of p-4).

buttons.primary: rounded-full px-8 py-4 text-sm uppercase tracking-widest transition-all hover:scale-105 hover:shadow-lg
buttons.secondary: rounded-full border border-current px-8 py-4 text-sm uppercase tracking-widest hover:bg-current hover:text-background

cards.style: Glassmorphic container with no internal padding for images, p-6 for content.

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b border-current/20 rounded-none px-0 py-4 focus:border-current focus:ring-0 transition-colors

effects: Text reveal animations (char by char) for headings.

scent_finder.design: A full-screen immersive quiz. Each step fades in/out. Background changes color subtly based on answers (e.g., 'Fresh' -> Light Blue tint).
scent_finder.interaction: Smooth transitions between questions. Final result revealed with a 'magical' particle effect.

chat_assistant.design: Floating glass panel on the bottom right. Not a chat bubble, but a 'portal'.
chat_assistant.behavior: Always visible but unobtrusive. Expands with a glassmorphic blur.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Update 'tailwind.config.js' to include the custom colors and fonts.
3. Create a 'Layout' component that handles the Dark/Light theme toggle and wraps the app.
4. Build the 'Hero' section first to establish the visual language.
5. Use the provided image URLs for specific products. Use 'generic_bottle' for others.
7. Do NOT use default Shadcn styles. Override them with the glassmorphism classes provided.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
